titles.title: I Know You Do What You Say!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I think of where You brought me from
To where I am today,
I stand amazed at the change.
When I think of where I am and
Where I might have been,
I've got one thing to say,
I know You do what You say!
Chorus:
I believe You when You say I'll rise again.
I believe You when You tell me
I'm free from sin.
I believe You when You tell me that I'm
Going all the way.
'Cause I know
You do what You say.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Today Your words became a light and
Life unto me.
When I remember where You brought me from
And how You set me free.
Now I know You'll take me to higher ground and
Greater liberty.
'Cause I know You do what You say.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The clouds are clearing and now I see a
Brighter day ahead.
I hear the words ringing in my ears,
You'll rise from the dead.
And I believe the words You speak to me 'cause
You walk with me each day.
And I know You do what You say.
